verses.plain: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

tokens.t: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

verses.plain: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.

tokens.t: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.

verses.plain: The eyes of the LORD are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

tokens.t: The eyes of the
in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

verses.plain: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.

tokens.t: A wholesome tongue
a tree of life: but perverseness therein
a breach in the spirit.

verses.plain: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.

tokens.t: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.

verses.plain: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.

tokens.t: In the house of the righteous
much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.

verses.plain: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.

tokens.t: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish
not so.

verses.plain: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.

tokens.t: The sacrifice of the wicked
an abomination to the
: but the prayer of the upright
his delight.

verses.plain: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the LORD: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.

tokens.t: The way of the wicked
an abomination unto the
: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.

verses.plain: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.

tokens.t: Correction
grievous unto him that forsaketh the way:
he that hateth reproof shall die.

verses.plain: Hell and destruction are before the LORD: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?

tokens.t: Hell and destruction
before the
: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?

verses.plain: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.

tokens.t: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.

verses.plain: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

tokens.t: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

verses.plain: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.

tokens.t: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.

verses.plain: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

tokens.t: All the days of the afflicted
evil: but he that is of a merry heart
a continual feast.

verses.plain: Better is little with the fear of the LORD than great treasure and trouble therewith.

tokens.t: Better
little with the fear of the
than great treasure and trouble therewith.

verses.plain: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.

tokens.t: Better
a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.

verses.plain: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.

tokens.t: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but
slow to anger appeaseth strife.

verses.plain: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.

tokens.t: The way of the slothful
as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous
made plain.

verses.plain: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

tokens.t: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

verses.plain: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.

tokens.t: Folly
joy to
destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.

verses.plain: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

tokens.t: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

verses.plain: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!

tokens.t: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word
in due season, how good

verses.plain: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

tokens.t: The way of life
above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

verses.plain: The LORD will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

tokens.t: The
will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

verses.plain: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.

tokens.t: The thoughts of the wicked
an abomination to the
: but
of the pure
pleasant words.

verses.plain: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.

tokens.t: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.

verses.plain: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

tokens.t: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

verses.plain: The LORD is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

tokens.t: The
far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

verses.plain: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

tokens.t: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart:
a good report maketh the bones fat.

verses.plain: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

tokens.t: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

verses.plain: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.

tokens.t: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.

verses.plain: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.

tokens.t: The fear of the
the instruction of wisdom; and before honour
humility.
